author: BBC News
title: Pittsburgh synagogue shooting accused to learn his fate
description: The prosecution says in closing arguments the alleged gunman "hunted" the Pittsburgh victims.
content:
A gunman who killed 11 worshippers at a Pittsburgh synagogue, in the deadliest antisemitic attack in US history, was "filled with hatred for Jews", a court has heard in closing arguments.

author: BBC News
title: How a dose of MDMA transformed a white supremacist
description: Brendan was once a leader in the US white nationalist movement. But when he took the drug MDMA in a scientific study, it would radically change his extremist beliefs – to the surprise of everyone involved. Rachel Nuwer investigates what happened.
content: Natalie Ginsberg, the global impact officer at the Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies (Maps) a non-profit group that has been spearheading research on MDMA  remembers standing next… [+3384 chars]

author: BBC News
title: Greece boat disaster: Capsized boat had 100 children in hold, BBC told
description: Survivors from a fishing boat that sank off Greece say as many as 750 people may have been on board.
content:
Survivors from a fishing boat that sank off southern Greece in one of Europe's worst migrant disasters say up to 100 children may have been on board.

author: BBC News
title: Texas sends busload of migrants to Los Angeles for first time
description: Los Angeles calls the move "abhorrent". Texas' governor says towns in his state are "overwhelmed".
content:
Los Angeles' mayor has accused Texas of a "despicable stunt" after dozens of migrants were driven to the California city from the border.
